channel.title: Comments on: The New Stereo System
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description: You keep saying bad things about them, yet I'm sure that in your youth you danced to Prodigy tracks and had a great time :)
item.content:encoded: You keep saying bad things about them, yet I’m sure that in your youth you danced to Prodigy tracks and had a great time :)

item.title: By: Shahar Kuchuk
item.dc:creator: Shahar Kuchuk
item.description:
"I’m having an amazing time listening to The Prodigy with it"
Can't you see the contradiction in this sentence??
item.content:encoded:
“I’m having an amazing time listening to The Prodigy with it”

Can’t you see the contradiction in this sentence??

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
You're more than welcome... hopefully to the new apartment (which I haven't found yet.)
Also, the speakers have a run-in period, just like cars, apparently. They need to work for a while and "get used" to the climate before they can produce their best sound.
item.content:encoded:
You’re more than welcome… hopefully to the new apartment (which I haven’t found yet.)

Also, the speakers have a run-in period, just like cars, apparently. They need to work for a while and “get used” to the climate before they can produce their best sound.

item.title: By: Kila
item.dc:creator: Kila
item.description: I want to try it out. Lets see how a 20 NIS stereo earphones person will react to your new stereo system...
item.content:encoded: I want to try it out. Lets see how a 20 NIS stereo earphones person will react to your new stereo system…
